name: Golem Village
description:
Life in a village retained inside the Golem Mountain is the only life you know of. Could there be a bigger world... somewhere?

   The game was made in 2 weeks for the Buddy Up Jam!   

Big thanks to everyone in the team and resources used:

Art Crew:  BT, José Andrade

Programming Crew:  csubhedar, famous_hero_007

Sound Crew:  RickRiffs

Writing Crew:  RickRiffs

Design Crew: plausibly literally everyone on the team

Other Crew: Oishii, ZeroBreak

Other Resources: 
->  https://lospec.com/palette-list/lost-century
->  https://github.com/JosephBarber96/UnityDialogueEditor
